name: A Honu World
description:
*Honu: Hawaiian word for sea turtle
Oceans have been littered with trash by pesky humans. Help the legendary honu save the ocean from trash before it's too late!

Make sure to DOWNLOAD this game for the best experience.

Created by Paulina Reyes, Jorge Avelar-Lopez, Hubert Teo, and Sofya Ogunseitan. We are four Stanford students passionate about saving the planet. Share this game to help raise awareness about ocean pollution in a fun way!
